#summary Offset Binary Data Field

= Offset Binary Data Field =


Provides the absolute offset in bytes from the beginning of the containing file, of this item. If [Bin_F_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_ItemLocationBox_OffsetSize OffsetSize] is 0, *Offset* takes the value 0.

*Serialization Namespace:*  [Bin_N_MP4 MP4]<br>*Assembly:*  MP4 (in MP4.dll)
== Data Serialization ==

=== Field Value ===
Type: *Int64* — a 64-bit (8 bytes) integer (!OffsetSize equal to 8 only)<br>Type: *UInt32* — a 32-bit (4 bytes) unsigned integer (!OffsetSize equal to 4 only)<br>
